description: This file contains CSS styles for the frontend of a tic-tac-toe application, managing themes and styling of various components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styles for alignment, background color, and text color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styles for the application, including layout, font size, and background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including size and animation settings.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styles for the theme toggle feature, including positioning, background color, and hover effects.
